row.process: :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_RA_REST.PRV.INCLUDE.CONNECTION_IS_SET_FROM_PROMPTS :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_RA_REST.PRV.INCLUDE.PUT_ATT_ENDPOINT :PUT_ATT conn_auth_method = "Basic" !Authen mode prompt :PUT_ATT conn_auth_basic_username = &CONN_AUTH_BASIC_USERNAME# :PUT_ATT conn_auth_basic_password = &CONN_AUTH_BASIC_PASSWORD# :PUT_ATT conn_auth_basic_host = &CONN_AUTH_BASIC_HOST# :PUT_ATT conn_auth_basic_port = &CONN_AUTH_BASIC_PORT# :PUT_ATT conn_auth_basic_realm = &CONN_AUTH_BASIC_REALM# :PUT_ATT conn_auth_basic_preemptive = &CONN_AUTH_BASIC_PREEMPTIVE# :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_RA_REST.PRV.INCLUDE.PUT_ATT_PROXY :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_RA_REST.PRV.INCLUDE.PUT_ATT_ADVANCE
